item.title: Running GUI applications in LXD on Fedora 26
item.description: Create container: [iaroki@fedora ~]$ lxc launch images:debian/stretch chrome Install needed tools: [iaroki@fedora ~]$ lxc exec chrome bash root@chrome:~# adduser iaroki root@chrome:~# apt update root@chrome:~# apt install x11-apps mesa-utils alsa-utils Map UID and GID ramges: [iaroki@fedora ~]$ echo "root:1000:1" | sudo tee -a /etc/subuid /etc/subgid Set UID/GUID ranges for container: [iaroki@fedora ~]$ lxc config set chrome raw.idmap "both $UID 1000" [iaroki@fedora ~]$ lxc restart chrome Mount X11 socket and .
